text:
In a world where people, unfortunately, tend not to give image files meaningful names, empty alt text as a default would definitely be an improvement...

<https://www.loom.com/share/eca02b8928c14c308bea71f7794b19c4>

Hello everybody,

I need to create a marketing form with 5 dependent fields. Problem is that conditional logic properties don't work in Sales Pro.
What is the best option to work around?
